entry.title: 6/1 - Nor Wind Nor Waters
entry.content:
DaVinci Art Alliance
📍 Philadelphia, PA, United States
🎨 All Visual Arts
📅 06/01/2019 deadline
💰 $20.00 fee
➡ Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

This exhibition will feature artworks that address the ongoing struggles of Puertorriqueño (Puerto Ricans) to rebuild physically, emotionally, and economically. All artists who are Puertorriqueño and/or feel connected to the issue are welcome to submit.

http://www.davinciartalliance.org/nor-wind-nor-water


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Last two weeks to submit.
Use this link for more details: http://www.davinciartalliance.org
